Max-Height

Last updated on May 30th, 2025

Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

Compatibility

ClassSupport

✅ Full Support
max-h-[n]
✅ Full Support
max-h-{n}
✅ Full Support
max-h-full
✅ Full Support
max-h-screen
✅ Full Support
max-h-min
🌐 Web only
max-h-max
🌐 Web only
max-h-fit
🌐 Web only
Legend

Class

-{n} Supports values from theme

-[n] Supports arbitrary values

Icon

✅ Full support

✔️ Partial support on native

🧪 Experimental support on native

📱 Native only

🌐 Web only
